Google Play requires that apps target API level 30 or higher.
This library supports using KSP instead of kapt, which greatly improves performance. Learn more: https://developer.android.com/studio/build/migrate-to-ksp

show-url.description: Learn about how to enable KSP and use the KSP processor for this dependency instead
